verses.name: Micah 2:4
verses.text: In that day shall one take up a parable against you, and lament with a doleful lamentation, and say, We be utterly spoiled: he hath changed the portion of my people: how hath he removed it from me! turning away he hath divided our fields.

verses.name: Micah 2:5
verses.text: Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast a cord by lot in the congregation of the Lord.

verses.name: Micah 2:6
verses.text: Prophesy ye not, say they to them that prophesy: they shall not prophesy to them, that they shall not take shame.
